entity.name: fliplearn_doubts_response
entity.query: SELECT Image_Id as id, SUBSTRING(Mathpix_API_Response, 10, INSTR(Mathpix_API_Response,",\"latex_confidence_rate\":")-10) as Mathpix_API_Latex,Mathpix_API_Response,Vision_API_Response from fliplearn_doubts_response where fliplearn_doubts_response.Image_Id = fliplearn_doubts_response.Image_Id;
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT Image_Id as id, SUBSTRING(Mathpix_API_Response, 10, INSTR(Mathpix_API_Response, ",\"latex_confidence_rate\":")-10) as Mathpix_API_Latex, Mathpix_API_Response, Vision_API_Response from fliplearn_doubts_response where fliplearn_doubts_response.Image_Id = fliplearn_doubts_response.Image_Id AND Image_Id = '${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select Image_Id as id from fliplearn_doubts_response where updated_at >= '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
